commit_message: rename some methods to be more consistent with sugars naming
allow anchor selection directly in read_anchors(), change ft.loc_range to ft.locs.range
bring anchorna on par with sugar commit 856f335
allow to use gaps in view
add export to Dialign anchor files
export: fix export with non-default mode
allow to read anchor files without offset
try to fix double indexing on RTD
docs: populate autodock_mock_imports with all modules
rtd: install anchorna to make it importable
enhance doc strings, add API doc, build on RTD
remove --no-cds flasg for all commands except create and go, no_cds flag is written to anchor files for convenience, fix combine of no_cds anchor files
view: prefer CDS annotaton over offset, fix stop codon in tutorial subset for tests, add no_cds flag to anchors
change mode=seq to mode=nt, change --jalview to more general --fmt option
rename options redid->gseqid, maxshift->search_range, add tiebreaker for objects in heap
ci: fix open log file on windows
add no_cds option and cli flag, add tests, refactor
switch most tests to aggressive remove mode

more improvements ->

  * add aggressive mode when removing contradicting anchors (now the default)
  * add export to GFF files
  * faster merging
  * fix tiny bug in remove contradicting anchors phase
try to fix windows coverage upload
try to fix open log file in windows
add test data: anchors for subset

major changes including

  * enhance algorithm, >10x speed up for the tutorial data set
  * add multiprocessing option (--njobs)
  * change names of some options
  * more tests
ci: add two more test runs, --full and -W error
add two tests, one is slow and is only run with --full option

refactoring and moderate changes

  * refactor AnchorList.remove_contradicting_anchors method
  * change name of thr_score option to thr_add_score
  * deal with edgecase of multiple found words with the same score
  * other minor changes
add compressed example GFF input file

major update including

  * update readme, documentation, add tutorial
  * use TOML format for configuration file
  * allow logging to a file
  * expected sequence input file format is now GFF with FASTA directive,
    this allows to specify CDS within the same file as sequences
  * switched the anchor file format from SJSON to GFF for better
    readability
  * add mini language to select, remove anchors
  * add mini language to define positions relative to anchors
  * new view command
  * change name of modes to aa, seq, cds
switch order in anchor file loading to fname|select|remove

several improvements

* allow to specify start/stop in cutout
* fix parsing of score options
* fix pipe
* help setuptools to find the package
